tag_list: pedro-da-cruz, advocatalog, barcelona-entrepreneur, pedro-da-cruz-lawyer, pedro-da-cruz-entrepreneur, pedro-da-cruz-advocatalog
overview:
Pedro da Cruz is Spanish Attorney, Entrepreneur and writer. He currently serves as Associate at law firm Strong Abogados, dealing with taxation and corporate law.

Pedro started his first project aged fifteen in London, where he produced at booklet for young people, detailing available services in the public sector. The project was financed by the National Health Service.

Since then, Pedro has gone on to execute and participate in a number of project, including the Millennium Awards which was financed by Camelot and Live Magazine (Brixton) which was financed from various sources.

In 2010 Pedro published an article in the Daily Telegraph UK. More recently, Pedro has been working on the publication of his first eBook, due to be released in 2012.
